Middle School Physics

Are you a parent looking for an entertaining, engaging, and high-quality physics curriculum for your middle schoolers? Look no further! Discover the exciting world of physics with Science Mom & Math Dad!

Purchase now
View video

Middle School Physics

  • Gain a solid understanding of the scientific method and the history of physics.
  • Learn the key ideas of the Laws of Motion and their application in your day-to-day life.
  • Learn how to complete a lab assignment as you collect and analyze data.
  • Demonstrate your mastery of the concepts of physics through quizzes and practice problems.

Prepare for high school physics!

Join Science Mom and Math Dad for a journey through physics that covers the laws of motion, forces, and gravity!

  • Participate in the live sessions or complete the course at your own pace.
  • Secular curriculum covering motion, energy, and forces
  • Open-and-go design with 39 video lessons
  • The course comes with printable notes pages and practice problems designed to reinforce the ideas of each lesson.
  • Students can participate in the polls in both the live and recorded lessons.
  • Complete 12 projects and labs.
  • One price for the whole family. Long term access.
